message.title: Message
message.content1: Morilab is a research lab that creates useful systems in the medical field based on high-dimensional image analysis from 2D to 4D. By using the technology that computers understand the human body, we aim to revolutionize diagnosis and treatment, and to challenge new industrial applications and visualizations.
message.content2: We respect autonomy and work together with partners around the world to create a better future.

theme1.title: Image Recognition, Understanding, and Computer Vision
theme1.description: Use PC to analyze medical images and connect to cancer detection and density structure analysis
